vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Specific Use Permit for an alcoholic beverage establishment limited to a bar, lounge, or tavern and a commercial amusement (inside) limited to a dance hall on property zoned an FWMU-3-SH Walkable Urban Mixed Use Form Subdistrict with a Shopfront Overlay within Planned Development District No. 595, the South Dallas/Fair Park Special Purpose District, on the northeast line of Botham Jean Boulevard, southeast of South Boulevard
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a five-year period with eligibility for automatic renewals for additional five-year periods, subject to a site plan and staff’s recommendation conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a one-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Z234-101(GB)
vote.description:

Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a five-year period with eligibility for automatic renewals for additional five-year periods, subject to a site plan and staff’s recommendation conditions

Z234-101(GB)
